metadata.synopsis: The orthon has been defeated and the player comments on this, based on their knowledge (Raphael may have forewarned them and suggested they get rid of the orthon).
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Kill the Orthon2. Wait for VB to play.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I wonder what brought an orthon to a place like this? We'll never find out now...
0.context: NodeContext: Defeated an orthon (large bounter-hunting devil) and wondering what it was doing here in the first place

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I suppose Raphael will be pleased, if nothing else...
1.context: NodeContext: Acknowledging that they helped one devil by killing another.
